name.type.description: The type of Kling video content to be generated, such as 'Link', 'Text', etc.

name.failure.description: The failure status of the task

name.failureReason.description: The reason why the task failed

name.traceId.description: The trace ID of the task

name.createdAt.description: The date and time of Kling video generation

name.cfgScale.description: Reference metric for the video being generated

name.startImage.description: The reference image for generating the video

name.negativePrompt.description: Negative text prompt for video generation

name.endImage.description: The reference image for generating the video

name.prompt.description: A text prompt for inputting content

name.ingredients.description: Enables creating videos with multiple images

name.model.description: The model version used for video generation

name.ratio.description: Aspect ratio used for video generation

name.effect.description: Style parameter name for toggling between different versions or styles in the model

name.ingredientsModel.description: The model version used for video generation

name.klingBot.description: Name of the Kling video generator

description.ingredients.message: If you wish to upload multiple images to generate a custom video, enable this option.

description.imageUrl.message: In a multi-image video creation task, you must upload multiple images.

description.prompt.message: Prompt text for generating Kling videos

description.negativePrompt.message: Negative text prompt (optional), limited to 200 characters

description.uploadStartImage.message: Upload a start-frame image as reference. The final video will use the start-frame for guidance.

description.uploadEndImage.message: Upload an end-frame image as reference. The final video will use the end-frame for guidance.

description.cfgScale.message: Degree of freedom for video generation, optional [0,1]. Higher values indicate stronger relevance.
description.cfgScale.description: Description for parameter guiding generation freedom

placeholder.select.description: Placeholder text for fields requiring a selection

placeholder.prompt.message: Enter the prompt text for the video style to generate, e.g., moving
placeholder.prompt.description: Placeholder text for the prompt input field

placeholder.negativePrompt.message: Enter negative prompt text for the video style to generate, limited to 200 characters
placeholder.negativePrompt.description: Placeholder text for the negative prompt input field

button.precise.description: Button text for generating Kling videos precisely

button.creative.description: Button text for generating Kling videos creatively

button.generate.description: Button text for generating Kling videos

button.uploadImageUrl.description: Button text for uploading an image

button.uploadVideoUrl.description: Button text for uploading a video

button.uploadReferences.description: Button text allowing users to upload references

message.uploadReferencesExceed.message: You can upload a maximum of 1 image
message.uploadReferencesExceed.description: Error message when the number of uploaded images exceeds the limit

message.uploadReferencesSuccess.description: Success message when an image is successfully uploaded

message.uploadReferencesError.message: Failed to upload image, please try again later
message.uploadReferencesError.description: Error message when image upload fails

message.startingTask.description: Message displayed when a drawing task begins

message.startTaskSuccess.description: Success message when a task is successfully started

message.startTaskFailed.message: Failed to initiate task, please contact the administrator
message.startTaskFailed.description: Error message when starting a drawing task fails

message.usedUp.message: Your credits are used up, please purchase more to continue using
message.usedUp.description: Message displayed when all credits are depleted

message.generating.description: Message displayed while an image is being generated

message.downloadVideo.description: Message displayed while an image is being generated

message.extendVideo.description: Message displayed while an image is being generated

message.generateFailed.description: Message displayed when image generation fails

message.uploadVideoExceed.message: The number of uploaded first frame images exceeds the limit
message.uploadVideoExceed.description: Error message displayed when the number of first frame images exceeds the limit

message.uploadVideoSizeExceed.message: The uploaded file size cannot exceed 10MB!
message.uploadVideoSizeExceed.description: Error message displayed when the uploaded file size exceeds 10MB

message.uploadVideoTypeFailed.message: The uploaded file must be in MP4 format!
message.uploadVideoTypeFailed.description: Error message displayed when the uploaded file is not in MP4 format

message.uploadStartImageExceed.message: The number of uploaded first frame images exceeds the limit
message.uploadStartImageExceed.description: Error message displayed when the number of first frame images exceeds the limit

message.uploadEndImageExceed.message: The number of uploaded last frame images exceeds the limit
message.uploadEndImageExceed.description: Error message displayed when the number of last frame images exceeds the limit

message.uploadStartImageError.message: Failed to upload first frame image
message.uploadStartImageError.description: Error message displayed when uploading the first frame image fails

message.uploadVideoError.description: Error message displayed when uploading a video fails

message.uploadEndImageError.message: Failed to upload last frame image
message.uploadEndImageError.description: Error message displayed when uploading the last frame image fails

message.uploadDocumentsError.description: Error message displayed when uploading a document fails

message.noOperations.description: Message displayed when no operations are available

message.noTasks.message: No historical tasks available, please click on the left to generate a video
message.noTasks.description: Message displayed when there are no tasks
